carsouel.carsouelCaption1: Our School Patiently Teach the Best Practice For Defensive Driving
carsouel.carsouelCaption2: Customized Course Help You To Identify Driving Weakness And Improve Driving Skills Quickly
carsouel.carsouelCaption3: Guarantee Success To The Written And Road Test

homePageFirstCardGroup.card1Text: High Quality, Fast learning, Quickest Offer & Money Saving
homePageFirstCardGroup.card2Text: Translate your Chinese Driver License Online
homePageFirstCardGroup.card3Text: Familiarize yourself with the driving knowledge and practice

aboutASDrivingSchoolContent.para1: All Successful Driving School is one of the MTO approved and specialized driving schools and it is dedicated to helping students achieve their dreams to become a skilled, responsible and safe driver by providing visualized, student-centered and small-sized quality in-class lessons, and one-to-one in vehicle advanced training.
aboutASDrivingSchoolContent.para2: Instructors in our driving school, who have many years of experience and familiar with the routes and features of all the drive test centers, are very patient, helpful and dedicated.
aboutASDrivingSchoolContent.para3: The school also provides additional services, such as free G1 tutoring & practice test, notarization and translation of licenses, vehicle purchase and insurance, International licence and car accident inquiry, etc

coachZhang.para1: Instructor Zhang is an excellent and experienced instructor registered by the Ontario government. He is energetic, patient and detail-oriented, and proficient in traffic regulations and road test skills in Ontario.
coachZhang.para2: And also, he is good at using easy-to-grasp and efficient visualized teaching methods to enable students to master Essentials of safe driving.
coachZhang.para3: In addition, he usually implements intensive training before the test according to the characteristics of the test centers, which results in a high passing rate. Therefore, students gave him wonderful reviews and feedback.

coachZhou.para1: Instructor Zhou is an excellent driving professional with more than 30 years of driving experience and registered with Ontario government. He is expert, responsible, patient and enthusiastic.
coachZhou.para2: By making good use of unique training methods, he can ensure that students master safe driving skills in a short time. He is also familiar with the key points of road test, and usually makes appropriate arrangement of road tests in small towns so that the road test passing rate is over 98%.

coachHao.para1: As an excellent Instructor of both in-car and in-class instruction, instructor Hao is very experienced, responsible, and very knowledgeable with road tests and traffic regulations. He can accurately grasp the characteristics of each student, and implement targeted road training and theoretical teaching accordingly.
coachHao.para2: And also, he explains and analyses difficult and confusing points by using pictures, videos and other methods, which won a lot of praise from students.

footer.address: 4438 Sheppard Ave. E , unit 319, Toronto Ontario M1S 1V2

onlineTranslation.cardText1: 1. This translation is a translation certificate from the Association of Translators and Interpreters of Ontario (ATIO), officially accredited by the Ministry of Transportation;
onlineTranslation.cardText2: 2. This translation certificate is not responsible for the authenticity of the original documents provided by the customer;
onlineTranslation.cardText3: 3. Please fill in the detailed mailing address, including your full address along with your postal code. If it is an apartment/condo/unit, please include your unit number. If you do not, the courier will return the mailto us and the customer will be responsible for the additional fees;
onlineTranslation.cardText4: 4. The translation certification may take up to 2 business days. After the completion of the translation, we will use Canada Post's Expedited delivery system. The delivery time will take up to 2-3 business days. After the delivery has been sent, we will send an email to inform you of your tracking number. Note: The courier will deliver to your mailbox without signature.

courses.course1Text: This course is designed for the people who already have some driving experience and only need to take a couple of in-car lessons. And then go with our professional instructors to take G2 or G road tests to get licences. Characters of this course:
courses.course1ListText1: 1. Focus on the weaknesses and make improvement fast
courses.course2Text: This course is designed for experienced students who want to refresh improve their driving skills and knowledge or require additional professional training to brush up on some certain skills. They may not need to take road tests.
courses.course3Text: This course is designed for students who are testphobia. Their skills and knowledge may not be poor, but they keep failing due to the fear or too nervous to take road tests. Our test package can relieve their stress and reduce the cost so that students can go take the tests with ease.

classSchedule.day1Part1Text: Attitude / Ontario licence/ Rules of the road
classSchedule.day1Part1Text5: Level One (Class G1 License) and restriction
classSchedule.day1Part1Text6: Level Two (Class G2 License) and restriction
classSchedule.day1Part1Text7: Level Three (Class G License) and privilege
classSchedule.day1Part2Text: Vehicle components, pre-driving and right of the way
classSchedule.day1Part2Text4: Traffic signs and Lights & Pavement markings
classSchedule.day2Part2Text2: How to drive safely in the city
classSchedule.day2Part2Text5: How to drive safely on rural roads
classSchedule.day3Part1Text1: Someone is injured in a collision
classSchedule.day3Part1Text2: Nobody is injured in a collision
classSchedule.day3Part1Text3: How to report a collision after it happens

schoolUpdate.blog1Text: Earundem vigiliam eligendo in ei pluribus concipio. Expectabam etc meo qui videbuntur quascunque propositio explicetur. Per qui aër iii meos uti idem. Ii gi credimus connivet bonitati. Ei magna mo an satis capax menti majus. Cognita humanam ii caloris testari in. Ii usitate si communi figuras. Co articulo ex attentum in indiciis referrem.
